fade-up.name: Fade Up on Scroll
fade-up.description: Elements fade in and slide up when they enter viewport
fade-up.css: opacity: 0; transform: translateY(30px); transition: opacity 0.6s ease-out, transform 0.6s ease-out;
fade-up.implementation: Use Intersection Observer to add 'visible' class when element enters viewport.
fade-up.reactHint: const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); useEffect with IntersectionObserver. Style: { opacity: isVisible ? 1 : 0, transform: isVisible ? 'translateY(0)' : 'translateY(30px)', transition: 'all 0.6s ease-out' }

fade-in-slow.name: Slow Elegant Fade In
fade-in-slow.description: Slow, elegant fade for luxury aesthetics

fade-up-stagger.name: Staggered Fade Up
fade-up-stagger.description: Multiple elements fade up with staggered timing
fade-up-stagger.implementation: Each child element has increasing transition-delay. First: 0ms, Second: 100ms, Third: 200ms.
fade-up-stagger.reactHint: Map through items with index. transitionDelay: `${index * 100}ms`. Trigger all when container visible.

slide-in-left.name: Slide In from Left
slide-in-left.description: Element slides in from the left side
slide-in-left.css: opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-50px); transition: all 0.6s ease-out;

slide-in-right.name: Slide In from Right
slide-in-right.description: Element slides in from the right side
slide-in-right.css: opacity: 0; transform: translateX(50px); transition: all 0.6s ease-out;

scale-in.name: Scale In
scale-in.description: Element scales up from smaller size
scale-in.css: opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.9); transition: all 0.5s ease-out;

hover-lift.name: Hover Lift
hover-lift.description: Card lifts up with enhanced shadow on hover
hover-lift.reactHint: onMouseEnter/onMouseLeave to toggle hover state. Style changes transform and boxShadow.

hover-scale.name: Hover Scale
hover-scale.description: Element slightly scales up on hover

hover-glow.name: Hover Glow
hover-glow.description: Element gets glowing shadow on hover
hover-glow.reactHint: Use accent color in rgba for glow. boxShadow: isHovered ? '0 0 30px rgba(accent)' : 'none'

image-zoom.name: Image Zoom on Hover
image-zoom.description: Image zooms slightly within its container on hover
image-zoom.css: overflow: hidden; img { transition: transform 0.5s ease; }
image-zoom.reactHint: Container with overflow:hidden. Image inside with transform scale on hover. Smooth 0.5s transition.

parallax.name: Parallax Background
parallax.description: Background image moves slower than foreground on scroll
parallax.css: background-attachment: fixed; background-position: center; background-size: cover;
parallax.implementation: Use background-attachment: fixed for simple parallax. For advanced: calculate scroll position and adjust backgroundPositionY.
parallax.reactHint: Simple: backgroundAttachment: 'fixed'. Advanced: useScroll hook, adjust backgroundPositionY based on scrollY.

glassmorphism.name: Glassmorphism
glassmorphism.description: Frosted glass effect with blur and transparency
glassmorphism.css: background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); border-radius: 16px;
glassmorphism.reactHint: Style: { background: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.1)', backdropFilter: 'blur(10px)', WebkitBackdropFilter: 'blur(10px)', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)' }

glassmorphism-dark.name: Dark Glassmorphism
glassmorphism-dark.description: Frosted glass effect for dark themes
glassmorphism-dark.css: background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
glassmorphism-dark.reactHint: Style: { background: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)', backdropFilter: 'blur(10px)', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)' }

gradient-text.name: Gradient Text
gradient-text.css: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6366f1, #8b5cf6); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text;
gradient-text.reactHint: Style: { background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, primary, secondary)', WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text', WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent' }

gradient-border.name: Gradient Border
gradient-border.css: border: 2px solid transparent; background: linear-gradient(white, white) padding-box, linear-gradient(135deg, #6366f1, #8b5cf6) border-box;
gradient-border.reactHint: Use pseudo-element or border-image for gradient borders

counter-animation.name: Number Counter
counter-animation.description: Numbers count up from 0 to target value
counter-animation.implementation: useState for current value, useEffect with setInterval to increment. Start when element visible. Clear interval when target reached.
counter-animation.reactHint: const [count, setCount] = useState(0); useEffect: interval that increments count until target. Format with toLocaleString() for commas.

typing-effect.name: Typing Effect
typing-effect.description: Text appears as if being typed
typing-effect.implementation: useState for displayed text, useEffect with setInterval to add one character at a time. Optional cursor blink.
typing-effect.reactHint: const [displayText, setDisplayText] = useState(''); setInterval adding one char from full text. Cursor: blinking | character.

pulse-cta.name: Pulsing CTA
pulse-cta.description: Button has subtle pulsing animation to draw attention
pulse-cta.css: @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); } 50% { transform: scale(1.05); } } animation: pulse 2s infinite;
pulse-cta.reactHint: Use CSS keyframes or framer-motion for subtle scale pulse on CTA buttons

float-animation.name: Floating Element
float-animation.description: Element gently floats up and down
float-animation.css: @keyframes float { 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-10px); } } animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
float-animation.reactHint: CSS keyframes for gentle up/down motion. Good for hero images, icons, decorative elements.

gradient-animation.name: Animated Gradient Background
gradient-animation.description: Background gradient that slowly shifts colors
gradient-animation.css: background: linear-gradient(-45deg, #ee7752, #e73c7e, #23a6d5, #23d5ab); background-size: 400% 400%; animation: gradientShift 15s ease infinite;
gradient-animation.reactHint: Apply animated gradient to hero backgrounds for dynamic feel. Use subtle colors for professional look.

video-background.name: Video Background
video-background.implementation: <video autoPlay muted loop playsInline style={{ position: 'absolute', width: '100%', height: '100%', objectFit: 'cover', zIndex: -1 }}><source src='video.mp4' type='video/mp4' /></video>
video-background.reactHint: Video element with autoPlay muted loop playsInline. Absolute positioned behind content. Add gradient overlay div on top for text readability.

image-reveal.name: Image Reveal
image-reveal.description: Image revealed with sliding mask effect
image-reveal.implementation: Container with overflow hidden. Pseudo-element or div slides away to reveal image. Triggered on scroll.
image-reveal.reactHint: Wrapper with clipPath or transform on overlay. Animate clipPath: inset(0 100% 0 0) to inset(0 0 0 0) on scroll.

before-after-slider.name: Before/After Slider
before-after-slider.implementation: Two overlapping images. Slider div in middle. Drag to adjust clip-path or width of top image. Mouse/touch events for dragging.
before-after-slider.reactHint: useState for slider position (0-100). Left image full width, right image with clipPath based on position. onMouseMove/onTouchMove to update position.

lightbox.name: Image Lightbox
lightbox.description: Click image to open fullscreen modal view
lightbox.implementation: Click handler opens modal with larger image. Modal has dark overlay, centered image, close button, optional prev/next navigation.
lightbox.reactHint: useState for isOpen and selectedImage. Modal component with fixed position, high z-index. Backdrop with onClick to close.

smooth-scroll.name: Smooth Scroll
smooth-scroll.description: Smooth scrolling when clicking anchor links
smooth-scroll.reactHint: Add scroll-behavior: smooth to html/body. Or use element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) for programmatic scrolling.

sticky-header.name: Sticky Header
sticky-header.description: Header stays fixed at top when scrolling
sticky-header.reactHint: Style: { position: 'sticky', top: 0, zIndex: 100 }. Optional: change background/shadow when scrolled (useState + scroll listener).

scroll-progress.name: Scroll Progress Bar
scroll-progress.description: Progress bar showing how far user has scrolled
scroll-progress.implementation: Fixed bar at top. Width calculated from scrollY / (documentHeight - windowHeight) * 100%.
scroll-progress.reactHint: useEffect with scroll listener. useState for progress. Fixed div at top with width: `${progress}%`.

warm-overlay.name: Warm Color Overlay
warm-overlay.reactHint: Use as backgroundImage with image: `linear-gradient(...), url(image.jpg)`

dark-overlay.name: Dark Overlay
dark-overlay.description: Dark gradient overlay for text readability

accent-overlay.name: Accent Color Overlay
accent-overlay.reactHint: Use brand colors with transparency for hero overlays

neon-glow.name: Neon Glow Effect
neon-glow.reactHint: textShadow or boxShadow with bright neon color. Multiple shadows at increasing blur for glow effect.

particle-background.name: Particle Background
particle-background.implementation: Canvas element with particles array. requestAnimationFrame loop to update positions and redraw. Particles: position, velocity, size, opacity.
particle-background.reactHint: useRef for canvas. useEffect for animation loop. Generate random particles, update positions each frame, wrap around edges.

morphing-blob.name: Morphing Blob
morphing-blob.description: Organic blob shape that continuously morphs
morphing-blob.reactHint: Div with background gradient and animated border-radius. Creates organic, flowing shape.
